thread.title: Great place to come home to :)
thread.title_full: Great place to come home to :) - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Leslieb20160805
title: Great place to come home to :)
text:
What a wonderful spot this hotel is. It was cozy and inviting. The staff were very attentive...always there to wish you a good day as you headed out and there to welcome you home again. They truly saw to all our needs and wants. The bar was well stocked and the wait staff very efficient and pleasant. The hotel is in a great location with many must see sites within a short distance. It is close to the tube which of course makes it easy to get around London.
